Laser tweezer

Nano-manipulation and high speed imaging combined to further our understanding of DNA repair mechanisms.

Super-resolution microscopy

CLIR 2.0. A collaboration with the Mayo Clinic.

This is a large scale effort to dramatically improve our understanding of the effects of many factors on the markers used in diagnostics.
